definition: living within a living animal usually as a parasite, any of various parasites that live in the internal organs of animals (especially intestinal worms)
details:
adjective
- living within a living animal usually as a parasite
= synonyms: entozoic
- of or relating to entozoa
= synonyms: endozoan
noun
- any of various parasites that live in the internal organs of animals (especially intestinal worms)
= synonyms: endozoan
